dotnetType.name: FloatSerializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FloatSchema" /> and attempts to map it to
            any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new float serializer builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful result if the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FloatSchema" />; an unsuccessful
            result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Builds a float serializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated serializers should use for write operations.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FloatSerializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinarySerializerBuilderCase
